Text: Final Booking Info Needs for June Cruise Cc Greetings Cruise Group Below is the information from the travel agent concerning our June cruise The agents names is Virginia Book She is copied on this email if you need to email her as well It looks like depending on what room you wanted the price is person more than what Robyn originally told you Robyn feels bad but I told her thats chump change to all you Rockefellers However if you want to downgrade your room to peasant class with all the Browns to compensate for that increase please contact Virginia directly You need to contact Virginia concerning your deposit and specific identification name by Sunday Feb which really means Friday Feb Dont forget or delay Wed hate to lose some of you Weve got a good group together Because of our group size were going to get some discounts See below Anything we get as a lumpsum discount Robyn and I will ensure it gets spread across the entire group ScooterKenny Please provide this information to the friends youve invited Also Im not sure my email address for Rusty is good so make sure he knows Virginia There is a group of us interested in playing golf at one of the disports Can you find out for me the possibilities of getting teetimes for about folks to play It looks like the most likely spots are Grand Cayman or Mexico Obviously I dont have a feel for course availability or timing requirements I would look to you to tell me where my best spot is to get off the boat play a round of golf on an adequate course and get back on the boat before I get left Please let me know what my golfing options are Thanks I REALLY APPRECIATE TAKING CARE OF YOUR GROUP FOR THE GALVESTON SAILING OF THE RHAPSODY OF THE SEAS June The rates are as follows Category K J not available plus and taxes and fees total each and per cabin Category I plus and taxes and fee total each and per cabin Category F plus and taxes and fees total each and per cabin Category D plus and taxes and fees total each and per cabin Deposit of per cabin and exact passport or birth certificate names are due on February Final payment is due by April I will need credit cardpreferred for payment or if paying by check need to have checks here at least days prior to payment dates There will be a per cabin discount at final payment Also if all cabins booked sail there will be a tour conductor deduction of be divided among all ten cabins of you at final payments Royal Caribbean does not sell cancellation insurance for groups but it is recommended at each I will call Berkley Care the company that does their insurance for you after deposit and names are confirmed Berkley Care only takes checks You all will need a valid passport or Certified or original birth certificate with raised seal and government ID like drivers license Sometimes the ladies need their marriage certificate to show the maiden name matching on birth certificate I will check on that for you all He cancellation penalties are as follows From days per person From days percent of total price days or less no refund This is so exciting and you all have a fine ship for your sailing experience You are confirmed for second seating for meals but that can be changed if you like Many thanks Virginia Muchas Gracias Jason R Brown Conoco Inc Regional Coordinator GCBU Crude Oil Supply Trading NA Houston CH K ETN Fax Original Message From Brown Robyn D Sent Tuesday January PM To Brown Jason R Brown Robyn D Subject Upcoming cruise The following decision has been made not by me Scooter The date of the cruise has been changed to June through the th This is due to several factors There were people that could not go the first week but could go the second week There was no one that could not go the second week The availability of cabins is much greater the second week The travel agent thought the second week would be less crowded I am making reservations tomorrow I have the following cabin choices for everyone The prices are per person Steve Joanne the cheapest window room I cruise cost port charge taxes Russ Valerie room with a private balcony D cruise cost port charge taxes Scooter Teri room with a private balcony D cruise cost port charge taxes Rusty Acie room with a private balcony D cruise cost port charge taxes Scooters friends outside cabin on main deck F cruise cost port charge taxes Lynda Darrel the cheapest window room I cruise cost port charge taxes Jeff Mere the biggest inside room K or J if avail cruise cost port charge taxes Robyn Jason the biggest inside room K or J if avail cruise cost port charge taxes Kenny Jennifer the cheapest window room I cruise cost port charge taxes Kennys friends the cheapest window room I cruise cost port charge taxes If you have any changes let me know immediately After I make the reservations I will let you know how to put down your deposit I think it will be due two weeks from the time I make the reservation Robyn
